mapper.update: UPDATE place SET views = views + 1 WHERE cd = #{cd}

SELECT T1.* , C1.cd_nm AS district_nm
, C2.cd_nm AS category_nm
FROM place T1 -- cdmgr 테이블이 어디에 있는거임 LEFT JOIN cdmgr C1 ON ( C1.cd = 'district' AND C1.key_cd = T1.district )
LEFT JOIN cdmgr C2 ON ( C2.cd = 'food' AND C2.key_cd = T1.category )
LEFT JOIN cdmgr C2 ON ( C2.cd = 'hospital' AND C2.key_cd = T1.category )
WHERE T1.cd = #{cd}

SELECT COUNT( user_cd ) AS cnt , ( SELECT IF( COUNT( user_cd ) = 0, 0, 1 ) AS like_yn FROM place_like WHERE place_cd = T1.place_cd AND user_cd = #{userCd} ) AS like_yn FROM place_like T1 WHERE place_cd = #{placeCd}

SELECT T1.* , T2.id AS user_id , ( SELECT new_nm as new_nm FROM file WHERE cd = T1.file_cd AND place_cd = -1 ) AS new_nm FROM place_review T1 INNER JOIN user T2 ON (T2.cd = T1.user_cd) WHERE T1.place_cd = #{cd} AND T1.del_dt IS NULL AND T2.del_dt IS NULL ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
